name: The "Modern" Age
description: So the future. So far, but yet closer than ever. Many dream of those advances in technology, but is it worth it? What if. What if all we are doing is creating our own doom. AI will become a thing one day, by this I mean it will be everywhere. The player of this little story had created a AI from a script. This wasn't a physical AI, but a digital one. It was constructed using C#. Just as someone learned how to make amazing stuff with red stone from Minecraft, someone learner how to design an amazing thinking, feeling AI. Join their story, your story.
